name: Green Thai Tea Recipe
description: This easy and healthy green Thai tea recipe is perfect for cooling down on a hot summer's day or for warming up during the winter.
recipeIngredient: 1.5 tablespoon Thai green tea number one ((see notes))

recipeInstructions.text: Place green Thai tea leaves into a cloth filter in a pitcher.

recipeInstructions.text: Pour hot water over the green Thai tea leaves in the filter. Let it steep for 3 minutes, or longer, depending on how strong you like it.
